Title: Maran Gas Roxana to deliver LNG Canada’s cooldown cargo
Description: The 173,400 m3 Maran Gas Roxana LNG tanker will deliver the cooldown cargo to the Shell-led 14 mtpa LNG Canada project ahead of its commissioning.
Author: JS

Title: Outlook for Stade LNG clouded by DET-HEH superstructure dispute and contract termination
Description: Germany’s planned Stade LNG terminal continues to face delays after the termination of contracts between operator Deutsche Energy Terminal and Hanseatic Energy Hub over an unresolved dispute regarding the completion of the terminal’s superstructure.
Author: CK

Title: Singapore’s LNG bunker sales dip further in February after January slump
Description: Singapore’s LNG bunker fuel sales edged lower in February, extending January’s weakness, according to the Maritime Port Authority of Singapore.
Author: CK

Title: Thailand’s Gulf Energy seeks two May LNG cargoes
Description: Thai power producer Gulf Energy has tendered for two May LNG cargoes for delivery to the Map Ta Phut terminal in Rayong. The tender closes today.
Author: CK
